titleStmt.title: Influences of the life of grace. Or, A practical treatise concerning the way, manner, and means of having and improving of spiritual dispositions, and quickning influences from Christ the resurrection and the life. publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T.C. for Andrew Crook, and are to be sold by James Davies at the gilded Acorn neer the little North door in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "march 2d"; the 9 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with an "8".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
